You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
GRANTS MANAGEMENT PRODUCT DOCUMENTATION
Learn about Grants Management

Become familiar with Grants Management, see how it compares with Outbound Funds Module, and explore the data model and the supporting objects.

Meet Grants Management
Grants Management helps grantmakers streamline their processes and get critical funding out to their communities quickly.
GM Compare Grants Management with Outbound Funds
Understand the differences between Grants Management and Outbound Funds module to choose the best product for your organization.
Roles in the Documentation
The Grants Management documentation is designed to guide admins through the basic setup of Grants Management. Following this documentation, you should have a functional portal for your grantseekers to visit, and your internal users will be able to perform grantmaking tasks, such as reviewing Funding Requests, inviting a grantseeker to apply, and managing milestones through Requirements.​
Get to Know the Data Model
Learn what's included in Salesforce Grants Management.
Grants Management Entity Relationship Diagram
Review how Grants Management objects are connected to each other.
Grants Management Data Dictionary
The Grants Management Data Dictionary contains of list of custom objects and fields included in Outbound Funds Module and Grants Management, when they were introduced, and descriptions where available. This is a useful resource for developers and admins to explore and understand the Grants Management data schema in depth.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
